title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - Apr 30 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - Apr 30 2022
description:
Clay's Thesis statement: "I really believe that Elon Musk buying Twitter is the most significant thing that has occurred from a First Amendment perspective in the 21st century. The Elon Effect: Clay and Buck each gain more than 10,000 followers overnight. MSNBC’s Ari Melber frets about Elon Musk buying Twitter: He can rig the entire site! Trump says he will not return to Twitter. C&B think this may be best, and Clay also says this could be due to Trump's possible exclusivity to Truth Social. New York Times Maggie Haberman: Twitter did Trump a favor by banning him and actually hurt the Democrats. Federal judge will temporarily block Biden administration from lifting Title 42. Pollster Mark Penn: American voters haven’t been afraid like this in a long time.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
